title: Stargazers Cosmic Watchlist
summary: Premium watchlist for anime, movies, TV, and games with smart stats, TMDB enrichment, and server-first architecture.
description: A server-first CRUD watchlist application featuring Google OAuth, AI-powered recommendations via TMDB, comprehensive statistics (runtime totals, completion rates, heatmaps), and beautiful glassy UI. Built with cosmic-ui design system, Drizzle ORM for type-safe database operations, and Next.js Server Actions for mutations.

title: Photon Trail
summary: AI-powered personal finance dashboard integrating Plaid for bank connections, OpenAI for smart categorization, and cosmic-ui for premium UX.
description: Personal finance application with secure Plaid Link integration for connecting bank accounts, AI-powered transaction categorization using OpenAI, and beautiful dark-themed UI built with cosmic-ui. Features NextAuth authentication, Drizzle ORM with Neon serverless PostgreSQL, and real-time transaction syncing via SWR.

title: Cosmic Digest
summary: Automated AI newsletter with personalized relevance scoring, trend detection, price tracking, and email delivery.
description: AI-powered newsletter automation system that curates personalized news digests from RSS feeds. Features intelligent relevance scoring based on topics and keywords, trend detection by comparing article frequency across time periods, product price tracking with buy/hold recommendations, and automated email delivery via Mailgun. Built with .NET 10 and OpenAI for smart content curation.

title: cosmic-ui
summary: Personal React component library with dark glassy aesthetic, CSS variable theming, and Next.js 15+ compatibility.
description: A lightweight design system and React component library built on Radix UI primitives. Features a premium dark theme with glass morphism effects, CSS variable-based theming, command palette (cmdk) integration, and optimized for Next.js App Router with proper ESM/CJS exports. Published on GitHub Packages and used across all my projects for consistent cosmic-themed UI/UX.
